intro: Psychotria timbiquensis, commonly known as the Timbiquí psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical rainforests. The plant contains various alkaloids, some of which have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties.
